content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Best Buy is a great place to check for deals, and they often have discounts or bundle offers on popular fitness trackers like the Fitbit Inspire HR.

Remember to also check the prices and deals on Amazon, as they often match or beat Best Buy's prices. And don't forget to look for any promo codes or coupons that might be available online.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you find an amazing deal on the Fitbit Inspire HR for your friend's birthday gift!

Happy shopping!
